message: Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'DEFAULT' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'SONIC' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Static member variable not following naming convention - Name 'WSOLA' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
